title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: The bug report is missing a description. Please provide more details about the issue, including what is happening and what should be happening. Additionally, please include the steps to reproduce the bug.
EB: This should at a maximum only result in one redraw for each visible line.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Open the application
2. Perform the action that triggers the text change with word wrap
3. Observe the number of redraws that occur. It should only be one redraw per visible line.
